mapper.select:
select cdm.cd as bat_number_cd , cdm.name as bat_number , pcm.time_slot as time_slot , pcm.time_slot_name as time_slot_name , pcm.consume_point as consumed_point , rslt.member_code as member_code , rslt.status as status , rslt.asp_code as asp_code , rslt.reservation_id as reservation_id
, case when to_timestamp(coalesce(to_char(rslt.reservation_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD)'), #{reservationDate})|| ' ' ||pcm.time_slot, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24') < current_timestamp then 1 else 0 end as expire_flag
, case when rslt.status = '0' then 0 when coalesce(rslt.member_code, '') = '' then 1 else 0 end as empty_flag from code_master cdm left outer join tbl_point_consume_master pcm on pcm.date_kind = #{dateKind} left outer join ( select rev.* from tbl_reservation rev inner join tbl_asp asp on rev.asp_code = asp.asp_code
and rev.asp_code = #{aspCode}
and rev.reservation_date = to_date(#{reservationDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
and (rev.status = '1' or (rev.status = '0' and rev.register_date > current_timestamp + '-3 minute' ))
) rslt on rslt.reservation_time = pcm.time_slot_name and rslt.bat_number = cdm.name
cdm.code_type='990'
order by pcm.time_slot, cdm.cd
